name: is_anagram_phrase
description: Checks if two phrases are anagrams of each other with additional customization options.

phrase1.description: The first phrase to be compared.

phrase2.description: The second phrase to be compared.

ignore_case.description: If True, ignores case when comparing the phrases. Defaults to True.

ignore_punctuation.description: If True, ignores punctuation when comparing the phrases. Defaults to True.

ignore_whitespaces.description: If True, ignores whitespaces when comparing the phrases. Defaults to True.

return_cleaned.description: If True, returns the cleaned versions of the phrases along with the result. Defaults to False.
